Articles.Content:
So I have seen people doing pass the save game form of multiplayer and I would like to as well but with only one other person who is willing to do it cooperativly and not blow the crap outta each other!

I would like to have a coop game going on with a goal of trying to build space stations and make land bases on different planets using only stock parts, mechjeb, and KW rocketry.

I would also be recording my end of the game if anyone is interested let me know!

But, but, you have a tank as a avatar. How do I know you won't blow me up? (Says the guy with a ray gun)

Kidding. I doubt I could keep it interesting for you as I find I have limited time to play KSP.

However, I look forward to your video.

I got one going on right now with Kethane and a friend of mine. We aren't blowing the crap out of each other (yet*).

I got time for two.

* I make no promises that it won't devolve, but I certainly don't plan on starting it if it does.

I got one going on right now with Kethane and a friend of mine. We aren't blowing the crap out of each other (yet*).

I got time for two.

* I make no promises that it won't devolve, but I certainly don't plan on starting it if it does.

Ok cap. any other mod you wish to use 1 or 2? If so let me know!

A project you might want to look into is one called KCBP where we build stations and bases, you can find it under the thread in the spirit of cooperation and competition. We just finished our first two stations and I think we have imbalanced teams.

I got one going on right now with Kethane and a friend of mine. We aren't blowing the crap out of each other (yet*).

I got time for two.

* I make no promises that it won't devolve, but I certainly don't plan on starting it if it does.

You could always send a stupid amount of ships into orbit as a deterrent(it actually works)100 should do it.Just re-installed Kethane hoping to join in if you want.EDIT:Scrap that you started already I'll be following throughout.
